fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
Environmental organisation working on Energy, transport, environment, agriculture, pesticides.  
We build coalitions with progressive businesses on sustainable transport
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
Natuur & Milieu is member of the following organisations:

goals__remit: Dutch environmental non-governmental non-profit organisation. We strive for a beautiful and healthy world and focus on three main topics: food, transport and energy.
